h4.EntCropMode (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_EntCropMode_AILib]
*No Return*
*Parameter 1: entsInOut (Entity Array (modified))*
*Parameter 2: modeName (string)*
*Parameter 3: time (float)*
Removes entities that do not have the specified mode.
The time parameter is completely ignored, but it's less confusing to leave it in than to try to
give it a name that indicates that designers should fill in a dummy value

h4.EntCropState (AccessLevel 9) [Notes|Command_EntCropState_AILib]
*No Return*
*Parameter 1: entsInOut (Entity Array (modified))*
*Parameter 2: stateName (string)*

check against any of those states
